title: 8th Sem Placements
content: So..I have only a T2 offer as of now...Will any T1 companies come in 8th semester?This recession has ruined my mental health....I just wanna know if there's any hope?

comments.body: What's your cgpa bro.. just done with 3rd semester..i dont have good cgpaðŸ¤§
I have around 8...tbh I dont think my gpa has held me back a lot..its just horrible luck in interviews...
Sorry but unlikely. Some T1 companies offered to come till November-December during my time. But after that itâ€™s unlikely.
